alert.note: Alert for Hall; Hamilton; Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 5:18AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Light snow and light freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Nance, Merrick, Polk, Hall and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions that will impact the morning commute. Increasing northwest wind gusts may cause tree and power line damage due to accumulated ice and snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread significant ice accumulations have ended. However, periodic light snow and light freezing drizzle are expected to continue through mid to late morning. Other than perhaps some lingering flurries, dry conditions return this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
